page.shortlink: api a5 add new user function
page.description: Allows the administrator to add a new user account. Member_of is a semi_colon (;) delimited list of groups that the user is a member of.
page.prototype: L a5_add_new_user(C master_password ,C user_name ,C user_password [,C member_of [,C startup_script ]])

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: The master password for the database.

argument.name: user_name
argument.description: The name of the new user.

argument.name: user_password
argument.description: The password for the new user.

argument.name: member_of
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of groups.

argument.name: startup_script
argument.description: Optional. Default = no startup script. The name of the user's startup script.

page.discussion: The A5_ADD_NEW_USER() function allows the administrator to add a new user to the User Account File. Requires that the database first be password protected.
